website_summaries.verdict: God of War is a staggering achievement in gaming -- the sort of must-play title that we only get two or three times in a console's lifespan.
pros: God of War is a surreal and mind-blowing action-RPG that provides players with a nonstop over-the-top adventure through Norse mythology
It's a long, satisfying game that offers much more beyond just a linear campaign
cons: The game's combat is difficult to master and occasionally too versatile for its own good
The menu system also isn't great

customer_reviews.title: This is God of War 4 in a different package.
customer_reviews.text: There wasn't any description about the item and I was hoping it was actually the FIRST GOW re-released on the PS4 but it's not. This is just a "playstation hits" version of the latest God of War game. Having the name "God of War Hits" is NOT ACCURATE and needs to be changed to "Playstation Hits, God of War".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dont know what the other bad reviews are about
customer_reviews.text: I havent played the game yet but that 1 star review should have known. and for the 3 star review about the missing items, I dont think anything else is suppose to come with it aside from the disc inside since this is a greatest hits edition. Other than that my game came in sealed with the disc intact. Im also jumping the gun with this review and not playing this cause I have seen many good things about this game.
customer_reviews.author: sneakatone

customer_reviews.title: Get it, it is a great experience.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best games ever made. You don't need to play any of the other GoW games to enjoy this one since it moves to a completely different scenario away from the Greek gods. Do yourself a favor and play it in HDR with a PS4 Pro, the graphics are some of the best ever produced to date. Story, combat, music, graphics and voice acting is all too notch.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Nelson Perez Pillot

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresentation
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware nowhere on the selling information dose it say downloadable version only , I thought that I was getting the full gaming disc version and the send me a cut out of another game pkg with a code on it , did not want to download to the console and this is just a total misrepresentation of the product they are selling , so if you don’t mind buying something like this and take a chance that the code doesn’t work go right ahead and buy it !
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Huber

customer_reviews.title: Awsome!
customer_reviews.text: Great game to jump back into god of war. I have not played since the ps2 god of war 1. Beautiful graphics, so far a great story. Don't listen to the 1 star review. This is the most recent god of war game. Not the ps3 rereleased ps2 era God of war games.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Game of this generation!
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing else to add to what has already been said about this amazing piece of art. This is truly a masterpiece that should be experienced by anyone that owns a PS4.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: This is just like the original, it's just that it is a playstation hit so you can purchase it if u don't have the original, it's a good game and also at a low price

customer_reviews.title: Boring game

customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat this deal, $10 for a game like this is amazing. It is a must have if you are a true God of War fan.

customer_reviews.title: Decent packaging
customer_reviews.text: Game came packed pretty well without any damage. Plays fine
customer_reviews.author: Malactie

customer_reviews.title: GOY God of War
customer_reviews.text: This game was great. Story was very interesting and kept you wanting more. The franchise definitely will continue but most likely on the next generation of game consoles. This is not a remake of the original GOW, so please do not purchase it thinking it is. This is a totally different story line, that takes place after GOW 3. There is also plenty to do once you finished the main story.
customer_reviews.author: Matt McFadden

customer_reviews.title: Very linear game, not my style, cool story line and cut scenes though.
customer_reviews.text: It's known as one of the best games ever made. And I have to admit the story line is great, it's like you are playing a movie. However, this game is not my style, it's completely linear in that it is filled with tons of puzzles that you have to figure out before you can open other doors/pathways. I would like to play games to relax and numb my mind after a long day of work, this does not do that for me haha.
customer_reviews.author: BeSharp

customer_reviews.title: Not the best packing
customer_reviews.text: The disk came inside original box but was not mounted to its place, it was a bit scratched due to its misplace during the shipment. So far it works but I don’t know if these scratches will have effect my game

customer_reviews.text: This game is amazing. Well done story. Awesome visuals. Action gameplay. Just make sure you start at an appropriate difficulty. It can be very challenging in God mode.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: Truly amazing game!
customer_reviews.text: I was a fan of the original god of war games. However, this completely blew all my expectations. The combat is so refined, and especially when playing on higher difficulties, can be extremely challenging. The story is so engrossing I just kept on wanting more. I was particularly impressed by the boss fights, with the Valkyries being my favorite. Definitely one of the best PS4 exclusives without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Game Case
customer_reviews.text: Just got the game today. Went to open the package it came in. And found that the games case was broken and cracked. The game seems to be in working order. But the case is so damaged. I can't store the game in it. Will try and see if the PlayStation Store will replace, and send me a replacement holding case to protect my new game. Or will have to return the item, and buy a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer D.W.

customer_reviews.title: A True and Exciting New Adventure for Kratos

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING game
customer_reviews.text: No DLC, No Micro transactions, No predatory monetization. This is what gaming should be. A 30 - 40 hour adventure teaching a fallen god about Fatherhood, a Son about humility, and trying to honor their mother's final wish. Norse mythology everywhere. If you have not played this, PICK IT UP NOW.

product_meta.title: God of War Hits - PlayStation 4
product_meta.description: A new beginning: his vengeance against the gods of Olympus Far behind him, Kratos now lives as a man in the lands of Norse gods and monsters. It is in this harsh, unforgiving world that he must fight to survive and teach his son to do the same
feature_bullets: Physical combat over the shoulder Free camera brings the action closer than ever combat in God of war is up close frenetic and unflinching. Kratos' Axes powerful, magic and multi faceted is a brutal weapon as well as a versatile tool for exploration
Midgard and beyond: set within the untamed forests, mountains, and realms of Norse lore, God of war features a distinctly new setting with its own pantheon of creatures, monsters, and gods
Vicious, physical combat with an over the shoulder Free camera that brings the player closer to the action than ever before

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars2,408 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
